head.supplied: 25th Jan. [18]87 ¶ Sir, ¶ ¶ I beg to inform you that at a meeting of the Executive Council held on the 18th instant an order was made requiring you to continue to perform your duties till the 30th Ju...

div.p: No.306, p. 61, unit 76, VPRS 1187/P, outward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

I beg to inform you that at a meeting of the Executive Council held on the 18th instant an order was made requiring you to continue to perform your duties till the 30th June 1887, notwithstanding that you have attained the age of sixty years.

p.style: font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-family: Geneva;

div.p: I have the honor to be,
